name: HollowPlugins
body:
# HollowPlugins
=============

## Repository for Hollow World's plugins

This page contains the plugins I've maintained and developed for Hollow World, a gaming community based around Minecraft. They are protected by GPL 3.0. Please contact me if you wish to use them in your own endeavours.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
